meanings.definition: Lacking the basic necessities for a comfortable or successful life.
meanings.sent1: The underprivileged children in the neighborhood struggle to afford school supplies.
meanings.sent2: It is important to support underprivileged communities by providing access to education and healthcare.
meanings.sent3: The underprivileged puppy was thrilled to receive a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her underprivileged background served as a constant reminder of the importance of hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The underprivileged living conditions painted a stark picture of inequality in society.

meanings.definition: A person or group lacking the basic necessities for a comfortable or successful life.
meanings.sent1: The charity organization aims to help the underprivileged in the community.
meanings.sent2: Many underprivileged struggle to access proper healthcare due to financial constraints.
meanings.sent3: The underprivileged at the party were grateful for the donated food and clothing.
